channel.title: CVE Feed for techfyd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for techfyd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-38687|2024-08-02T04:19:19.351Z -- techfyd -- sky%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Techfyd Sky Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sky Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 2.5.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-38687|2024-07-24T13:47:44.138Z -- techfyd -- sky%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Techfyd Sky Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sky Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 2.5.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-2286|2024-06-24T14:41:29.618Z -- techfyd -- sky%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%28free%20templates%20library%2C%20live%20copy%2C%20animations%2C%20post%20grid%2C%20post%20carousel%2C%20particles%2C%20sliders%2C%20chart%2C%20blogs%29
item.description: The Sky Addons for Elementor (Free Templates Library, Live Copy, Animations, Post Grid, Post Carousel, Particles, Sliders, Chart) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the wrapper link URL value in all versions up to, and including, 2.4.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Sky Addons for Elementor (Free Templates Library, Live Copy, Animations, Post Grid, Post Carousel, Particles, Sliders, Chart) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the wrapper link URL value in all versions up to, and including, 2.4.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
